articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Namibian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Reply Message to Namibian President
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, sent a reply message to Hifikepunye Pohamba, president of the Republic of Namibia, on Friday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express my deep thanks to you for sending warm congratulations to me on my reelection as first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 I sincerely wish you and your people success in the efforts for the economic development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK FM Condemns Reckless Remarks of Israeli PM
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK FM Condemns Reckless Remarks of Israeli PM
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on Friday as regards the recent invectives let loose by the Israeli prime minister against the DPRK during his Japan tour:
					 We can never overlook the Israeli prime minister's reckless act of terming the DPRK a "rogue state", groundlessly claiming that it cooperated with Iran in "nuclear program."
					
					 This is nothing but a third-rate ploy of Israel to divert elsewhere the focus of international public criticism of it for recent moves to expand its Jewish settlements, the rupture of the Mideast peace talks, etc. and continue pursuing its expansionist ambition in the Middle East.
					
					 Israel is a cancer-like entity blocking Mideast peace and a "rogue state" going reckless, indifferent to international law.
					
					 That is why Israel is behaving so without knowing where it stands though it is censured and condemned not only in the Middle East but in all other parts of the world. 
					
					 Israel is secretly possessed of a large number of nukes under the patronage of the U.S. It is ridiculous, indeed, for it to grumble about "threat" from someone.
					
					 It should drop its bad habit of pulling up others whenever it is driven into a predicament and unconditionally meet the international demand for peace and denuclearization in the Middle East.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Censured for Press Censorship and Red Herring
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Censured for Press Censorship and Red Herring 
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea issued a statement on Saturday denouncing the Park Geun Hye group for resorting to press censorship and red herring in a bid to get rid of the worst crisis caused by the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.
					 When public at home and abroad became increasingly vocal chiding Park's unpopular rule and barbarian killings, the south Korean puppet group let the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee distort detailed news of the sinking accident. It is, at the same time, further intensifying the examination of news items and putting media under control, making sure that news favorable to it was reported.
					
					 It went the lengths of hurling a huge police to block the scene of the accident and restricting and banning the news coverage of the bereaved families of the victims. It kicked off even a racket of preventing media persons from reporting about mass anti-"government" actions against the Park regime across south Korea.
					
					 This is another hair-raising inhuman crime rubbing salt in the wounds of the bereaved families and other people of south Korea, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 Media persons are thrown into prisons after being handcuffed for the mere reason that they brought to light irregularities and corruption of society and called for fair reporting and progressive media institutions are in the danger of closure, becoming a target of suppression. This is the real picture of south Korean media.
					
					 The Park group is trying hard to gag media through horrible fascist violence which put the bloody "yusin" dictatorship into the shade. But it can never conceal the truth.
					
					 The group will have to pay dear price for its thrice-cursed crimes committed against the fellow countrymen and the nation.
					
					 We are convinced that conscientious journalists and media persons of south Korea will condemn the Park group's unpopular rule and moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen, more energetically wielding the pen of justice, and more dynamically turn out in the righteous struggle to bring the murderers to a court.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Cuba Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Cuba Appointed
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Pak Chang Yul was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Cuba, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Delegations Leave after Participating in International Trade Fair
articles.content:
Delegations Leave after Participating in International Trade Fair 
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Delegations of various countries and regions left here Saturday after taking part in the 17th Pyongyang Spring International Trade Fair.

articles.title: National Meeting of Artistes Closes
articles.content:
National Meeting of Artistes Closes 
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The second-day meeting of the 9th national meeting of artistes took place on Saturday. 
					 More speeches were made. 
					
					 Speakers said that the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un is what keeps the Juche-oriented literature and art alive and the Songun revolutionary exploits of the Workers' Party of Korea are the eternal theme and seed in the creation of masterpieces. 
					
					 They said they can create as many masterpieces as possible if everybody makes redoubled efforts to reach the high level of creation desired by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The dynamic music presentation by the Moranbong Band playing the role of an engine for a revolution in literature and art in the new era and the choruses of military songs staged by the State Merited Chorus are putting strong spurs to the steady advance of the Juche revolutionary cause started in Mt. Paektu, making the hearts of all the service personnel and people burn with enthusiasm, the speakers said, calling for thoroughly implementing the important tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his letter to the participants in the meeting. 
					
					 They deeply reflected on the fact that inactivity and stagnation manifested in the field of literature and art at present are attributable to the wrong ideological viewpoint and aesthetic outlook of creators and artistes and this is directly related to the faith in the victory of socialism in the final analysis. 
					
					 Speakers called for ushering in a fresh heyday of literature and art by grasping again and reconfirming the issue of roles of literature and art at present and the importance of the mission and duty of the creators and artistes in the present era and making even a single movie or an article a powerful weapon in the party's ideological work which can be a substitute for thousands of tons of food and tens of thousands of shells. 
					
					 Choe Thae Bok made a closing address. 
					
					 The 9th national meeting of artistes will go down  as a grand meeting which powerfully demonstrated the strong faith and will of the creators and artistes to fully display the might of the Juche-oriented literature and art and dynamically speed up the grand advance for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un and marked a milestone for an epochal turning point in the development of the Songun revolutionary literature and art in the 21st century.

articles.title: Aquarium at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Aquarium at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- At the recently-remodeled Songdowon International Children's Camp in the DPRK there is an aquarium which reminds one of fairy-tale "Dragon's Palace in the Sea".
					 The aquarium has 18 big and small water tanks of peculiar shapes teemed with various species of rare sea creatures.
					
					 Many campers would be reluctant to leave the "Dragon's Palace", attracted by its fantastic sight.
					
					 An Chang Gil, a student of Hyesan Orphans' Secondary School in Ryanggang Province, told KCNA:
					
					 My province has no sea. Now, I feel myself in a dream, watching and touching various species of rare sea fishes that I had seen on TV and books only.
					
					 The aquarium is like a huge nature classroom. I will tell my friends about what I saw and felt at this sea palace.
					
					 Ri Il Jong, a student of Yokjon Junior Secondary School in Rajin district, Rason City, said:
					
					 Tunnel section at the aquarium is most wonderful to me. At this place, I felt as if I was in a sea cave and fishes welcomed me.
					
					 Kim Jin A, a student of Suwon Secondary School No. 1 in North Hamgyong Province, said:
					
					 I touched flat fish at a water tank.
					
					 The aquarium is a favorite place of us, campers, as it helps deepen our sea knowledge while giving great pleasure to us.

articles.title: Campers Spend Enjoyable Days
articles.content:
Campers Spend Enjoyable Days
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Schoolchildren are enjoying ten-day camping at the Songdowon International Children's Camp, which was remodeled on the eastern coast of the DPRK as a monumental edifice.
					 The camp is one of the edifices witnessing Marshal Kim Jong Un's deep loving care for the rising generation.
					
					 The campers are involving themselves in colorful sporting and cultural activities. Laugh, cheers and even screams are heard from 4-D simulation cinema and video game room as well as swimming and wading pools.
					
					 The camping also includes skill exhibition, quiz and art performance. 
					
					 What catches one's eye is a cooking competition of the campers.
					
					 Aquarium, aviary and greenhouse are drawing attention of the campers.
					
					 They are expressing their gratitude to Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Worker's Party of Korea by singing the song "We Are the Happiest in the World".
					
					 Tong Ye Jong, a camper from the Rajin Junior Secondary School in Rason City, told KCNA that the camping is wonderful and she would unfailingly live up to the loving care shown by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Ri Ha Chol, a third-year student of the Orphans' Secondary School in South Hwanghae Province, said that it was the first time for him in his life to enjoy 4-D simulations.
					
					 The first-term campers are sons and daughters of workers, peasants and military officers in frontline areas as well as orphans from across the country.

articles.title: Signal Successes in Fish Catch
articles.content:
Signal Successes in Fish Catch
 Phyongsong, May 17 (KCNA) -- Fishermen of the fishery stations under the South Phyongan Provincial Fishery Management Bureau are reporting signal successes in fishing operations. 
					 Thanks to the dynamic drive of the officials and fishermen, in the first half of May 2.5 times as many fishes as those in the corresponding period of last year were netted by the fishery stations under the bureau. 
					
					 The fishery stations made thorough-going preparations for fishing operations. They focused efforts on modernizing fishing boats and tackles from the outset of the year. 
					
					 Fish haul is on the steady increase at all the fishery stations which started fishing operations earlier than usual after finishing the repair of fishing boats and arrangements for fishing tackles one month earlier than scheduled. 
					
					 The Kamapho Fishery Station brought fish haul per net to the maximum by establishing a well-regulated system for fishing operations and putting them on a scientific basis. 
					
					 The Mundok Fishery Station is boosting the fish catch by use of new kinds of nets while raising the operation rate of angle fishing net boats. 
					
					 The Hanchon and other fishery stations have extended sailing days to catch more fishes through a socialist emulation among fishing boats, making contributions to boosting the fish haul, taking the bureau as a whole.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye's Farce for Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Park Geun Hye's Farce for Reviving "Yusin" Dictatorship
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group turned the whole of south Korea into a mourner's house by causing a horrible tragedy. However, it is keen to misuse it for meeting its political purpose.
					 For example, she visited Phaengmok Port seized with grief and talked rubbish that she knows well what sorrow is as she experienced the grief of the bereaved family.
					
					 She likened the loss of the "yusin" dictator who lorded it over the people as a fascist tyrant to the sorrow of the bereaved families who lost their dear children due to the sinking of ferry Sewol. This is another hypocrisy and a crime against the bereaved families.
					
					 The Sewol disaster was an unprecedented massacre deliberately committed by the Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 Park who styles herself "president" responsible for the lives and security of the people committed such a hideous murder as burying at seabed hundreds of students as she took no measures and handled the incident irresponsibly.
					
					 Bereaved families wailed and an endless stream of mourners filled streets but Park did not shed even a drop of tear but gave the cold shoulder to the families of victims who were coming to visit Chongwadae.
					
					 She has not uttered even a word of apology to the people but is now keen on shifting the responsibility on to her yes-men. She is a depraved woman without an equal.
					
					 She is a cold-blooded woman unable to understand the feelings and mentality and joy and anger of human beings, to say nothing of the world of women and the pride of mothers.
					
					 How can she understand the sorrow and pain of the parents who have not yet seen even the bodies of their dead children?
					
					 Park earned an ill fame as the most evil woman of the century but she, claiming herself to be "president", talked about "sorrow", while calling herself a "bereaved family member". This is a ridiculous and disgusting remark.
					
					  Lurking behind this is her despicable intention to project their parents who plunged south Korea into a horrible abyss of disaster through decades of "yusin" dictatorial politics and reinstate them. 
					
					 Under harsh fascist tyrannical rule of "yusin" dictator Park Chung-Hee and his wife Ryuk Yong Su, south Korea was drenched with tears shed by south Koreans for scores of years in the last century and the whole of south Korea turned into a huge prison without bars.
					
					 Park who inherited the blood of the "yusin" dictator is trying to call back the departed souls of the dark age.
					
					 The recent demeanor of Park Geun Hye reflects her sinister aim to expand the "yusin" forces through the upcoming June 4 elections to local self-governing bodies.
					
					 During the past "presidential election" campaign Park staged a charade of disclosing her wretched plight as a single and an orphan before the people, to greatly benefit from it.
					
					 Being taken in by such gimmick, many south Koreans voted for her. But after "the election", she disclosed her true colors as a "yusin princess" utterly indifferent to the lives and security of the people.
					
					 The recent Sewol disaster was a tragedy which was caused because south Koreans made a wrong selection of the descendent of "yusin" as "president".
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable for Park to misuse Sewol disaster for the revival of "yusin".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye Group Root Cause of Misfortune of Nation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Park Geun Hye Group Root Cause of Misfortune of Nation 
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The invectives let loose by the spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea against the DPRK recently were an unprecedentedly hideous  provocation and a dangerous act to drive the north-south relations to the worst tension and ignite a war against the north, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article. 
					 Noting that the recent provocation was a clear revelation of the worst intention of the puppet forces to escalate the confrontation, the article goes on:
					
					 As it has become clearer at present, the Park Geun Hye group had no idea of improving the inter-Korean relations through dialogue and cooperation. 
					
					 Steeped in evil repugnancy toward the fellow countrymen in the north  and conception of confrontation to the marrow of their bones, the south Korean ruling quarters blustered that they would "proactively push forward their policy with long-term perspective," challenging the DPRK's positive efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations. In this way they missed the hard-won opportunity for mending the inter-Korean relations and worked with bloodshot eyes to escalate the confrontation campaign against the north.
					
					 It was by no means accidental that the puppet military gangster let loose such vitriol hurting the dignified system of the DPRK. It was an inevitable product of the extreme hostility of the south Korean puppet authorities toward their fellow countrymen and reckless war hysteria. 
					
					 The above-said provocation was nothing but a cynical ploy to tide over the serious ruling crisis. 
					
					 The Park group is kicking up war hysteria, bringing the situation to an extreme pitch in a bid to get rid of the overall crisis and escape its defeat in the forthcoming elections to the local self-governing bodies. That was the reason why the spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea let loose such unspeakable invectives against the dignified system in the DPRK. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her puppet military gangsters are the root cause of evils and misfortunes of the Koreans as they bring only confrontation and war to this land.

articles.title: Minju Joson Calls for Wiping Out Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Minju Joson Calls for Wiping Out Park Geun Hye Group
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The racket kicked off by the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea to escalate the confrontation with its fellow countrymen has gone beyond the tolerance limit. It is slandering the DPRK, depicting it as "a country without human rights and freedom" and "a country that should disappear at an early date".
					 Minju Joson Saturday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The Park group's invectives can never be overlooked as they are most blatant challenge to the dignified system in the DPRK.
					
					 This hideous provocation was aimed to launch all-out confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It is not the first time that the group let loose a spate of invectives against the ideology and social system in the DPRK. But the above-said provocative remarks have never been made before. This goes to prove that the moves of the Park group to bring the inter-Korean relations to a collapse and hurt its fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 Gone are days never to return when the DPRK could talk to the group as it is pursuing only confrontation with its fellow countrymen, instead of working for national reconciliation and unity and improved inter-Korean relations. What remains to be done is to mete out a merciless punishment to it.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK are fully determined to wipe out to the last man those provocateurs keen to bring down the socialist system, its life and soul, with most merciless and deadly strikes and all-people retaliatory actions as desired by all Koreans.
					
					 The Park group will have to keenly realize what high price it will pay for its vitriol.

articles.title: All-People Action to Cope with Ferry Sewol Disaster Declared
articles.content:
All-People Action to Cope with Ferry Sewol Disaster Declared
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Round-table Conference of People from All Walks of Life to Cope with Ferry Sewol Disaster in south Korea grouping at least 500 civic and public organizations held a press conference in Seoul on May 13 at which it called for turning out in an all-people action.
					 At the press conference speakers said that the people are growing angry, clearly seeing through reality how corrupt those in power are.
					
					 The people should get together to hold an all-people memorial service for the victims, they held.
					
					 Then an action plan was read out.
					
					 The organization declared it would honor the memory of the victims and rise up in an all-people action to probe the truth about the sinking accident and prevent the reoccurrence of similar accidents.
					
					 To this end, it will form an all-people fact-finding group with experts, bereaved families and people and conduct activities including memorial service, publication of a white paper on the disaster and a million persons signature campaign, the organization noted.
					
					 It read out a statement calling for taking measures to rescue those missing.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" to rescue all those missing and let the bereaved families and people participate in the work for clarifying the cause of the disaster, holding officials concerned responsible for it and taking measures to prevent the recurrence of similar accidents. It also urged the "government" to quickly open to public all information about the cause of the accident and rescue operations and stop at once human rights abuses against the bereaved families.

articles.title: Action for Having Park Geun Hye Regime Step Down Called for
articles.content:
Action for Having Park Geun Hye Regime Step Down Called for
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Those concerned of education in south Korea declared that they would turn out in the action for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol sinking accident and having the puppet regime step down, according to south Korean KBS and MBC.
					 More than 15 000 members of the Teachers Union Thursday released a declaration of teachers, asserting that there was no reason for the "president" to remain any longer as she has no will and capability to protect the people's life.
					
					 The declaration said that if Park Geun Hye can not thoroughly probe the truth behind the disaster and punish those responsible for it, she should step down.
					
					 Prior to this, south Korean teachers posted a declaration calling for the resignation of the puppet chief executive on the website of Chongwadae on May 13.
					
					 The declaration censured the Park's regime for working hard to evade the blame for the accident and binding eyes of the people, shutting their ears and gagging them by putting media under control.
					
					 It charged that the guideline of the Ministry of Education which banned government officials and teachers from taking part in the memorial services for the victims of the ferry Sewol sinking accident is a revelation of the attempt to calm down the people's anger and evade the responsibility for the accident.
					
					 It called for turning out in a positive campaign for resigning the Park regime filled with incompetence, irresponsibility, shamelessness, deception and arrogance.
					
					 At least 130 professors of Yonsei University in a statement on May 14 called for probing the truth behind the disaster and accused the "government" of making false reports, not positively coping with the accident after its occurrence. 
					
					 They strongly demanded the basic cause of the disaster and the "government's" responsibility for it be clearly indicated.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Are to Blame for Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Are to Blame for Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Overseas south Korean university professors and scholars in a joint statement Tuesday urged the south Korean authorities to bear responsibility for the ferry Sewol sinking accident, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The statement charged that the sinking disaster was caused by the "government's" incompetence and irresponsibility.
					
					 It said that the accident brought to light the general irregularities and corruption of the south Korean society.
					
					 It demanded the south Korean authorities take positive measures including compensation for the victims.

articles.title: Inhuman Act of Ferry Sewol Crewmen Censured
articles.content:
Inhuman Act of Ferry Sewol Crewmen Censured
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- It has been exposed that the captain and crewmen of the ferry Sewol ran away, leaving not only passengers but their wounded fellows, according to south Korean CBS on Tuesday.
					 The chief engineer and six others related to engines ran away, knowing that two crewmen fell down wounded.
					
					 Even after being rescued, they concealed the fact, not asking to rescue their wounded fellows on board.
					
					 Two abandoned crewmen are still missing.
					
					 The political trend of the puppet ruling forces seeking only their power and luxury and glory, indifferent to the people's life is fostering extreme individualism in south Korean society and such social ills were being brought into bolder relief through the ferry Sewol sinking disaster.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group's Aim Sought through Replacement of Confidants Disclosed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group's Aim Sought through Replacement of Confidants Disclosed
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on May 14 in an editorial disclosed the aim sought by the Park Geun Hye group through its farce of replacing confidants.
					 The editorial said that the authorities transferred to other  post the news director of KBS who tried to downscale the ferry Sewol sinking disaster only to spark off uproar of the bereaved families of the victims and appointed the man who have an in with a high-ranking person in Chongwadae to replace him.
					
					 The fact that the man was asked to come to Chongwadae a day before his appointment was brought to light to cause a social furor, it said, and went on:
					
					 It means the Park Geun Hye "government" has replaced the former director with a more dependable guy.
					
					 Even the man who played a key role in driving former "president" Ro Moo Hyon to death by persecuting him was appointed as a chief secretary for civilian administration of Chongwadae responsible for coping with the ferry sinking disaster.
					
					 This disclosed the ulterior intention of Park to put the prevailing situation under control with one-sided high-handed stance.
					
					 In the final analysis, Park is set to make preparations for an offensive phase as she is finding herself in a pretty fix.
					
					 A similar farce finds expression in the fact that an ex-public prosecutor was appointed as an official of the Intelligence Service.

articles.title: Those Concerned of Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident Urged to Make Declaration of Conscience
articles.content:
Those Concerned of Ferry Sewol Sinking Accident Urged to Make Declaration of Conscience
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea made public an appeal on May 13 urging those concerned of the ferry Sewol sinking accident to make a declaration of conscience for probing the truth about the accident.
					 The appeal demanded those concerned of the "government", Intelligence Service (IS), maritime police and ferry Sewol probe the truth about the accident.
					
					 The "government", the arch criminal of the disaster, is styling itself a judge, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The captain of the ferry ran away before anyone else after instructing passengers to stay calm.
					
					 Other crewmen hastily changed their clothes and ran away with the captain. The maritime police rescued the captain and crewmen, not passengers. Almost civilian fishing boats rescued passengers from the sea.
					
					 It is necessary to bring to light whether communications records just before the ferry sinking remain or not. There is a clue to clarifying why the ferry sank and if there was any issue at the early phase of the regime's reaction.
					
					 Those concerned of Chongwadae, ministries and agencies and staff members of the IS should also probe the truth behind the disaster.
					
					 The director of the Maritime Police Agency has never issued an official order for rescue operation.
					
					 A prosecutor, who was charged with the concealment of the truth about the Ryongsan disaster, was appointed as head of the joint investigation headquarters.
					
					 Those concerned of the accident should neither become conspirators in killing for their living nor sell their conscience so that they do not feel ashamed before their children and rising generation.
					
					 In order to prevent recurrence of such disaster, it is prerequisite to probe the truth about the accident and punish those responsible for it, the appeal said, adding those concerned of the accident should make a declaration of conscience, though belatedly.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- Over 100 activists of civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday at which they declared that they would form an all-people measure body for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster, according to south Korean KBS.
					 Terming the disaster the worst one, they said they would clearly probe the truth behind the disaster with the efforts of the people.
					
					 To this end, we will form an all-people measure body and push forward the publication of a white paper raising doubt about the sinking accident, they added.
					
					 They demanded the regime probe the truth behind the ferry disaster, open to public relevant information and take measures for victims.

articles.title: Discrimination against Part-time Workers Protested in South Korea
articles.content:
Discrimination against Part-time Workers Protested in South Korea
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Part-time Workers' Union at Schools of south Korea held a press conference nearby Kwanghwamun in Seoul on May 13 in protest against the discrimination against the part-time workers, according to south Korean KBS.
					 In the press conference speakers said the measure of the Ministry of Education on restricting wages is imposing a big strike on the life of the part-time workers at schools.
					
					 They noted that the union would wage a positive action in 17 areas to denounce the educational authorities for discriminating the part-time workers at schools.

articles.title: Quake Hits S. Korea
articles.content:
Quake Hits S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 3.5 on the Richter scale jolted Jeju Island on Thursday, according to south Korean KBS.
					 The epicenter was in waters 40 km southwest of Kosan-ri, Jeju Island.

articles.title: Japan Police Agency Searches Businesses, Companies of Koreans Belonging to Chongryon
articles.content:
Japan Police Agency Searches Businesses, Companies of Koreans Belonging to Chongryon
 Tokyo, May 16 (KCNA) -- The Japan Police Agency formed a "joint investigation headquarters" with police headquarters in Kyoto, Kanagawa, Yamaguchi and Shimane Prefectures and forcibly searched 20 places of businesses and companies run by Koreans affiliated to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on May 12 on charges of violation of the "law on foreign exchange".
					 The police authorities took such action, charging that a company operated by a Korean violated the law as the Armillaria mushrooms it imported from China were the "products of Korea".
					
					 The outrageous violence ahead of the 23rd Congress of Chongryon is timed to coincide with the rejection by the Tokyo High Court of the appeal submitted by Chongryon as regards the decision on allowing the sale of the Korean Hall. This is an intolerable politically-motivated suppression and human rights abuses committed against Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Lawyers who were present at the search scenes and other figures in the field of legal circles termed the recent search a fascist outrage aimed at the suppression of Chongryon as it was an illegal search in wanton breach of the criminal procedure code. They were consistent in asserting that lurking behind the search is a sinister attempt to have detailed survey and control of Chongryon and fabricate new charges and thus forcibly search institutions at all levels including the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon at any moment.
					
					 The court is also an accomplice of the illegal search as it issued a search warrant for those related to the Korean Goods Sales Company and the marine pharmaceutical company who had nothing to do with the above-said charge.
					
					 The hideous politically-motivated suppression and human rights abuses committed against Chongryon, an overseas Koreans' organization of the dignified Juche Korea, and Koreans in Japan can never be tolerated and the Japanese authorities will have to hold full responsibility for all consequences to be entailed by the police agency's fascist tyrannical act.

articles.title: Koreans in China Declare to Join Struggle for Punishing Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Koreans in China Declare to Join Struggle for Punishing Park Geun Hye Group
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China Wednesday made public a statement titled "Park Geun Hye group should opt for the just road of national cooperation, paying heed to the DPRK's warning."
					 The south Korean group of traitors is recently working hard to pass the buck for the drone case to the DPRK at any cost through the spokesman for the puppet Defense Ministry despite the just proposal of the DPRK to conduct a joint investigation into the case, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all the Koreans in China are hardly depressing their towering resentment against the treacherous crimes against the nation and reunification committed by the Park group, driving the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 All Koreans strongly call for sweeping away the Park group to the last one as it made no scruple of perpetrating the high treason.
					
					 It should promptly take the right road of national cooperation with sincerity, paying heed to the warning of the DPRK.
					
					 If the Park group continues escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen in the north, in disregard of the just warning of the DPRK, its army and people will mercilessly annihilate all the provocateurs.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will actively join the just struggle of the people in the homeland to punish the Park group hell-bent on the anti-DPRK moves.

articles.title: Young Koreans in China Blast Reckless Remarks of Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry
articles.content:
Young Koreans in China Blast Reckless Remarks of Spokesman for S. Korean Defense Ministry
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China issued a statement titled "Park Geun Hye group will face merciless punishment for its unpardonable treasons" on May 14.
					 Ignorant Kim Min Sok, spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense of south Korea, was so impudent as to defame the dignified system of the DPRK on May 12, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The puppet group is making desperate efforts to bring down the DPRK dignified for independence and powerful thanks to Songun politics.
					
					 A group of traitors taking the retrogressive track of history and a group which should disappear at an early date is the Park Geun Hye group which is under the colonial yoke.
					
					 All members of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China condemn with surging national resentment the puppet group for malignantly slandering the system of the DPRK while fully supporting the statement of the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea denouncing the invectives of the spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense.
					
					 The south Korean people are cursing the Park group, war servants of the U.S. and the arch criminals enforcing an unpopular rule which is bringing bigger misfortune by pushing confrontation with the north to an extreme phase, indifferent to the grief and wailing of the people after turning the whole of south Korea into a mourner's house.
					
					 Kim Min Sok and his manipulators will not be able to escape a merciless punishment by the Korean nation.
					
					 We will dynamically turn out in the action to make a clean sweep of Park Geun Hye and Kim Min Sok and their group at an early date.

articles.title: S. Korea's Economic Chaos Is Attributable to Sinking Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korea's Economic Chaos Is Attributable to Sinking Disaster
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- A researcher of the U.S. Centre for Strategic and International Studies said that the south Korean economy is thrown into chaos, an aftermath of the ferry Sewol sinking disaster, according to south Korean CBS on Wednesday.
					 He emphasized that minor enterprises and self-supporting business persons are suffering great losses, in particular.

articles.title: Swiss Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
articles.content:
Swiss Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung Formed
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Basel on May 11.
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set a remembrance period from June 15 to July 15 and decided to post works of the President and his exploits on its website and organize colorful events including remembrance meeting, film show and seminar.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits to Be Lauded by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits to Be Lauded by Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung said that it would take an active part in the international internet seminar on his great career and immortal exploits to be held late in June or early in July and highly praise the exploits he performed in accomplishing the global cause of independence.
					 A statement was adopted at the inaugural ceremony of the committee held in Basel on May 11. It said:
					
					 The Korean people and world progressives will commemorate with deep recollection the 20th anniversary of demise of the President in July 8.
					
					 His demise was the greatest loss of the Korean people and their friends and world progressives.
					
					 He is the father of socialist Korea and benevolent father of the Korean people who founded the DPRK and built the people's paradise.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the drive for achieving Korea's reunification and made great contributions to accomplishing the world revolution and the human cause of independence.

articles.title: Nepali Newspaper Introduces History of DPRK Speed
articles.content:
Nepali Newspaper Introduces History of DPRK Speed
						
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Nepali newspaper Arpan on May 8 carried a special article "Hot wind of creating speed in DPRK" illustrated with a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Chollima (flying horse) is symbolic of the spirit and mettle of the DPRK. 
					
					 Pyongyang speed, Vinalon speed and Chollima speed were created in the history of the construction of the DPRK and the socialist industrialized state was built on debris after the war in the last century. 
					
					 In the crucible of the movement for creating the speed in the 1980's the West Sea Barrage appeared as a miracle in the 20th century and the period of prosperity of Pyongyang was ushered in. 
					
					 In the 1990s the DPRK turned adversity into favorable conditions during the Arduous March, the Forced March when its people could not exist in the common sense due to the unprecedented moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK, and ceaselessly created the speed of advance for a great upswing for building a thriving nation. This was the might of the DPRK. 
					
					 The DPRK broke through the cutting edge of CNC technology in a short span of time, creating the speed of Huichon and the speed on Masik Pass whereby it carried out projects in a matter of three years or one year though they took 10 years at ordinary pace. These were eye-opening events. 
					
					 The last year which witnessed a great heyday in the construction clearly proved the marvelous speed of advance in the DPRK. 
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un visited the January 8 Fishery Station of the Korean People's Army and praised its builders for bringing the project close to commissioning in a matter of a little over two months since the initiative was taken to construct the station, calling this the speed of Korea. 
					
					 History proved that the speed of Korea means the speed for a great surge to bring about sea changes, the speed of leap forward for advancing into the world, pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and the speed of the heroic people who have proved in practice Korea does what it is determined to do.

articles.title: Nigerian Organization Blasts Japan's Ambition for Nuclear Weaponization
articles.content:
Nigerian Organization Blasts Japan's Ambition for Nuclear Weaponization
 Pyongyang, May 17 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its internet website an article "Japan's nuclear ambition" on May 5. 
					 The article said the international community is increasingly concerned about Japan's stockpiling of plutonium enough to produce a lot of nukes.
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Obviously, Japan is pursuing a sinister purpose. 
					
					 Explicitly speaking, Japan wants to go nuclear any time while massively stockpiling plutonium. 
					
					  It is the invariable ambition of Japan to realize nuclear weaponization, a strategic goal for becoming a military giant. 
					
					 Persistent moves for nuclear weaponization made Japan fully capable of producing nukes. What remains to be done is to manufacture nukes. 
					
					 In recent years Japan has become evermore undisguised in its moves to go nuclear. 
					
					 Then why is Japan persistently trying to have access to nukes? 
					
					 It is keen to go nuclear and embark on the road of overseas aggression and world domination. Herein lies the danger of Japan's stockpiling of plutonium for nuclear weaponization. 
					
					 In the past Japan perpetrated aggression and wars even without nukes, massacring people and committing monstrous genocide in the Asia-Pacific region. It is as clear as noonday that Japan will commit most horrible crimes if it is possessed of even nukes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta al presidente namibio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de respuesta al presidente namibio
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 16 el mensaje de respuesta al Presidente de la Republica de Namibia, Hifikepunye Pohamba.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Le expreso profundo agradecimiento por haberme enviado calidas felicitaciones con motivo de mi reeleccion al importante cargo de Primer Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon a Vd. y a su pueblo exitos en las labores para el desarrollo economico y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion del premier israeli sobre la RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX rechaza difamacion del premier israeli sobre la RPDC
						
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada el dia 16 por la ACNC en relacion con que el premier israeli acuso a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea durante su reciente visita a Japon, el portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC respondio como sigue:
					No podemos tolerar jamas el hecho de que el premier israeli se atrevio a difamar y ofender a la RPDC como "Estado bribon" vinculandola injustamente con Iran con el absurdo "rumor de la cooperacion nuclear".
					
					Este acto verbal no pasa de ser un truco barato para distraer el enfoque de las criticas de la opinion publica internacional, que se centra en Israel debido a la ampliacion de asentamientos judios y a la ruptura de conversaciones de paz del Medio Oriente, etc., y para continuar con su ambicion expansionista en esa region.
					
					Israel es el ente canceroso para la paz del Medio Oriente y el canalla que se porta insolentemente sin tomar en consideracion ni el derecho internacional.
					
					Por eso, Israel es criticado y denunciado en la region y en escala mundial, pero actua ahora con imprudencia a pesar de su situacion.
					
					Es ridiculo que Israel hablara tanto de la supuesta "amenaza" de alguien si bien llego a tener en silencio muchas armas nucleares bajo el amparo de Estados Unidos.
					
					Israel debe aceptar incondicionalmente la demanda internacional de la paz y desnuclearizacion del Medio Oriente, dejando su vicio de acusar a otros cada vez que cae en dilema.

articles.title: Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Cuba
articles.content:
Nombrado nuevo embajador coreano en Cuba
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Pak Chang Yul fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a acreditarse en la Republica de Cuba.

articles.title: Clausurada IX Conferencia Nacional de Artistas
articles.content:
Clausurada IX Conferencia Nacional de Artistas
Pyongyang, 17 de mayo (ACNC) -- Continuaron intervenciones en la segunda jornada de la IX Conferencia Nacional de Artistas efectuada el dia 17.
					Los oradores senalaron que la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la vida de la literatura y el arte del Juche y las hazanas del partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun son el eterno tema y la semilla de la creacion de las obras maestras.
					
					Dijeron que si todos se esfuerzan por alcanzar a la altura de la creacion deseada por el Mariscal pueden crear tales obras.
					
					Subrayaron que la musica de la Banda Moranbong y el coro de canciones militares del Coro Estatal Benemerito que toman la delantera de la revolucion literaria y artistica de nueva epoca promueven el avance de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu estimulando a todo el ejercito y el pueblo y juraron materializar cabalmente las tareas programaticas presentadas por el Mariscal en su mensaje.
					
					Reflexionaron severamente que la causa de estancacion de la rama literaria y artistica de la epoca actual reside en la erronea concepcion ideologica y estetica de los creadores y artistas, lo que esta relacionado directamente con el problema de fe en la victoria del socialismo.
					
					Reconocieron y reafirmaron el asunto de papel de la literatura y el arte de la epoca actual e importancia de la mision y el deber de la epoca de los creadores y artistas y destacaron la necesidad de abrir la nueva era dorada de literatura y arte logrando que una pelicula y un articulo sean la poderosa arma de la labor ideologica del partido para sustituir miles de toneladas de cereales y decenas de miles de proyectiles.
					
					Choe Thae Bok pronuncio un discurso clausural.
					
					La IX Conferencia Nacional de Artistas brillara como gran reunion que posibilito manifestarla firme conviccion y la voluntad de los creadores y artistas de exaltar el poderio de la literatura y el arte del Juche, impulsar la gran marcha de transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo y anotar el jalon del cambio trascendental del desarrollo de literatura y arte revolucionarias del Songun del siglo 21 bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal.
